org.sakaiproject.metaobj.shared.model

Class ValidationError

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.metaobj.shared.model.ValidationError

  • public class ValidationError
extends Object
    This object contains information reguarding an error on an individual field that occurs during validation
    See Also:
    ElementBean

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValidationError

        public ValidationError(String label,
               String fieldName,
               String errorCode,
               Object[] errorInfo,
               String defaultMessage)
        Construct a ValidationError with all the required parameters
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the field within this element. if the field is from a nested element, the parent field name will be prepended with a "."
        errorCode - Code that is suitable for dereferencing into a properties file for i8n purposes. errorCode will contain the proper formatting for use as a default message. for instance, "Value {1} for field {0} must match pattern {2}". With the error info, this could be used by a message formater.
        errorInfo - an array of information related to the error.
        defaultMessage - the fields applied to the error code.
